## Locally-advanced Adenocarcinoma

"Sandwich" chemotherapy before + after surgery:

Chemo (8 wks) $\rightarrow$ Surgery $\rightarrow$ Chemo (8 wks)

::: {.fragment}
Two different drug combinations:
:::
::: {.fragment}
-   FLOT (more effective)
:::
::: {.fragment}
-   FOLFOX (better tolerated)
:::
